comment:
*  A RecognitionConfig is provided to
     *  {@link SoundTriggerModule#startRecognition(int, RecognitionConfig)} to configure the
     *  recognition request.
     *
     *  @hide

variables.name: captureRequested
variables.comment:
True if the DSP should capture the trigger sound and make it available for further
         * capture.

variables.name: allowMultipleTriggers
variables.comment:
* True if the service should restart listening after the DSP triggers.
         * Note: This config flag is currently used at the service layer rather than by the DSP.

variables.name: keyphrases
variables.comment:
List of all keyphrases in the sound model for which recognition should be performed with
         * options for each keyphrase.

variables.name: data
variables.comment:
Opaque data for use by system applications who know about voice engine internals,
         * typically during enrollment.

variables.name: audioCapabilities
variables.comment:
* Bit field encoding of the AudioCapabilities
         * supported by the firmware.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
